mapper.select: SELECT e.exhibitionId exhibitionId ,#{memberId} memberId ,w.wished wishing ,c.rating rating ,c.content content FROM c6_exhibition e LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM c6_wishing WHERE memberId = #{memberId}) w ON e.exhibitionId = w.exhibitionId LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM c6_comment WHERE memberId = #{memberId}) c ON e.exhibitionId = c.exhibitionId WHERE e.exhibitionId = #{exhibitionId}
